2018.title: VPIlinkConfigurator 4.2
2018.description: VPIlinkConfigurator 4.2 enhances the user interface and design automation tools as well as enhances simulation capabilities comprising new design and analysis tools for high bit rate connectivity requests.

2018.title: VPIlinkDesigner 4.2
2018.description: VPIlinkConfigurator 4.2 improves the network design workflow and provides new built-in functionality that simplifies and accelerates link engineering tasks.

2018.title: L-Edit Photonics
2018.description: L-Edit Photonics enables the fast creation of a photonic design using a drag and drop methodology in an IC layout editor, without having to write a single line of code.

2018.title: Micro-Scale Nuclear Fusion
2018.description: Laser-heated nanowires produce microscale nuclear fusion with record efficiency.

2018.title: XI™ series
2018.description: The XI™ is a handheld Raman spectrometer with cloud AI technology with a 785 nm laser. It is fully integrated with the Data A1 smartphone and maintains constant WiFi/Bluetooth and 4G LTE connections.
